content: the bamboo bloom thick n thin cowl is an extremely easy pattern great project for beginners & seasoned knitters alike this cowl can be finished in a night or two making this cowl a good option for holiday gift giving all you need is 1 hank of universal bamboo bloom or universal bamboo bloom handpaint u s #10 5 6 5 mm 16 or 20 circulars bor marker & of course your time the pattern will produce a cowl sized approximately 34 circumference x 7 deep although it can be easily modified gauge is not critical but can influence desired size
